parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To say, declare. Properly, the same as the base of phos and phaino; to show or make known one's thoughts, i.e. Speak or say.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Neuter of a compound of eidolon and a presumed derivative of thuo; an image-sacrifice, i.e. Part of an idolatrous offering.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
An idol, false god. From eidos; an image; by implication, a heathen god, or the worship of such.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
